title: I have jungle Draven on my ranked team right now >.<
body:
His initial pick was jungle graves and last ban banned him for what I guessed was a preventative measure.

Nothing other than "wtf" in chat.

replies.body:
you must accept this, keep saying this manta over and over again:

"this must be in the new meta"
"this must be in the new meta"
"this must be in the new meta"

Count to 10, and in between numbers take deep long breaths.

Welcome to Hell. 


(i assume you are in bronze)
graves is literally month-ago-mundo level jungle. 6.3 isnt a big enough nerf to stop him from still being decent

Having never seen it before EVER I was more than skeptical myself. Although, to be honest, that new passive might make a camp clear difference. Good luck trying to catch a good gank on someone warding well though.
OP you do realise graves is a jungler right?
when u lose the game from lvl 1
Actually we just won. ADC pick went Elise and although Draven trolled for 50% of the game we won because the other team threw so hard.

> [{quoted}](name=DianasGotSwag,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=4EPXdhFQ,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-02-08T09:32:06.523+0000)

> Actually we just won. ADC pick went Elise and although Draven trolled for 50% of the game we won because the other team threw so hard.

nice ig luck was with u dude or girl
